name: Revelation (itch) (santisiul)
description:
Revelation

Between illusion and illumination, fulfill your function according to the Order of the Architect and reach Salvation between the eternal conflict of good and evil.

  • A game  made during the Global Game jam 2022. https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/revelation-1

Credits:

  • Shelitzin - Artist
  • Santisiul - Programmer 
  •  Federico Tula Ruiz - Audio
